titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for all souldiers to repaire to their companies.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at Our Court at White-Hall, the fiue and twentieth day of Ianuary, in the third yeere of Our Reigne of Great Britaine Scotland, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
